beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.miniContent: This level focuses on building a solid foundation. By the end of it, you will be able to understand how markets work, analyze financial instruments and companies in a simple way, and build your first investment portfolio.
beginner.content1: You will discover the relationship between key economic news — such as interest rate decisions — and their impact on financial markets.
beginner.content2: You will learn how to read basic financial statements (income, balance sheet, and cash flow) and understand the key financial ratios that help evaluate companies.
beginner.content3: You will master the basics of charting, types of candlestick patterns, and how to identify market trends.
beginner.content4: You will learn the importance of having a capital management plan, setting entry and exit points to avoid major losses.
beginner.content5: You will understand how to select diversified assets to build a simple, goal-oriented investment portfolio.
beginner.content6: We will conduct a hands-on application on the stock market you’re interested in, focusing on technical analyses to deliver accurate and valuable results.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.miniContent: After mastering the basics, this level delves deeper into more complex tools and analyses. By the end, you will be able to build your own trading strategies, use advanced indicators, and manage your emotions effectively.
advanced.content1: You will dive into the effects of fiscal and monetary policies and understand how major economic factors influence global markets.
advanced.content2: You will master asset valuation using models such as discounted cash flow and analyze growth and profitability ratios.
advanced.content3: You will learn how to use advanced technical indicators such as RSI and MACD, and understand complex chart patterns.
advanced.content4: You will explore and test various strategies such as day trading, swing trading, and scalping.
advanced.content5: You will learn how to control emotions and make rational decisions in a volatile and risky market environment.
advanced.content6: We will apply advanced strategies to live markets, focusing on integrating financial, economic, and technical analysis.

professional.title: Professional
professional.brief: Advanced Trading Systems and Complex Risk Management
professional.miniContent: This level focuses on deep strategies, advanced models, and complex risk management. By the end, you will be able to develop trading strategies, handle volatile markets skillfully, and make decisions based on multi-faceted analysis.
professional.title1: Advanced Economic Analysis and Quantitative Modeling
professional.content1: You will dive into macroeconomic data analysis and learn how to build simple econometric models to estimate inflation trends or interest rates and their complex impact on different asset classes.
professional.content2: You will master complex valuation models such as Discounted Cash Flow (DCF), intangible asset valuation, and how to use sector multiples and ratios to determine the true value of specialized companies.
professional.content3: You will move beyond the basics into Harmonic Patterns, advanced momentum and volatility indicators, and integrate trading psychology with technical analysis to anticipate market movements based on trader behavior.
professional.title4: Strategic Risk Management and VaR Measurement
professional.content4: You will learn how to calculate Value-at-Risk (VaR), use derivative hedging tools such as futures and options, and develop strict protocols for managing total portfolio exposure during crises.
professional.content5: You will apply Modern Portfolio Theory (MPT), calculate Beta coefficients, and incorporate alternative assets like commodities and currencies to maximize returns relative to risk (Sharpe Ratio), focusing on dynamic rebalancing.
professional.content6: You will explore how to build and backtest trading strategies using programming languages such as Python, learn about High-Frequency Trading (HFT), and transform investment ideas into automated trading systems.

review1.text: I tried to learn trading on my own, but my results weren’t successful. When my friend recommended Stock Squares and I learned with a professional trainer, my performance became disciplined and successful.
review1.name: Mohamed Samir

review2.text: I was confused at the beginning of my trading journey, but after joining Stock Squares, I gained clear understanding and effective strategies. The practical training helped me achieve real results and become more confident in my decisions.
review2.name: Anas Ayoub

review3.text: Heartfelt thanks! The course truly added great value to my trading knowledge. The explanation was clear, deep, and delivered by real professionals. Customer service follow-up was excellent in every way.
review3.name: Abdullah Ibrahim

review4.text: The content is rich and highly beneficial, offering practical and effective information that helps any beginner enter the stock and forex markets with confidence and clarity.
review4.name: Hossam Obeid

review5.text: The asset management service at Stock Squares exceeded my expectations — high professionalism, precise follow-up, and strategies truly tailored to my needs. I felt my wealth was in safe hands.
review5.name: Badr Fahdan

review6.text: When I joined the first level, I thought it would be difficult and I wouldn’t understand much, but the experience really made a difference. Now I see clear progress in my skills and I’m very happy with how far I’ve come. Thanks to everyone who contributed to this journey!
review6.name: Ibrahim Emam

chatAi.iamChat: I basir your smart assistant for trading in the financial markets
chatAi.intro: The nature of financial markets is price volatility, and that’s why professional traders aim to secure profits regularly. For successful trading, adjust the trade’s stop-loss to the entry price after reaching the first target. You can also take partial profit to convert floating profit into actual realized profit.
